texts.0: Hello, what can I do for you?
texts.1: What is the impact of my Citizen Score?
texts.3: With your current score, you are in the AAA class, making you one of the most exemplary citizens. As a result, you will receive many discounts and occasional allowances from the state. Keep up the good work.
texts.4: With your current score, you are in Class AA, making you a very model citizen. You will receive some discounts. If you continue like this, you can soon move up to the highest class.
texts.5: With your current score, you are in Class A, making you a good citizen. Continue to behave in an exemplary manner to enjoy benefits.
texts.6: With your current score you are in class B. You seem to be having some minor problems. Take a look at your Citizen app to see what that might be. There you will also see Suggestions on how you can become a better citizen. Until then, pay a small motivational tax. I wish you the best of luck in your endeavor.
texts.7: With your current score, you are in Class C. You seem to be having serious problems. Take a look at your Citizen app to see what the problem might be. There you will also see Suggestions on how you can become a better citizen. Until then, pay a motivation tax and have a diminished credit score. I encourage you to adjust your behavior.
texts.8: With your current score you are in class D. You have serious problems with integration into society. Your focus should now be exclusively on becoming a valuable part of society again. Visits to recreational facilities and consumer credit are therefore not an option for you at this time. As a sign of your good will, you will also pay a compensatory tax on all your purchases.
texts.9: With your current score, you are in Class E. You are not currently a valuable member of society. If you do not change your behavior immediately, serious action will have to be taken. To be able to work in a profession again, they must have more than 300 points to move up to Class D.
texts.10: With your current score, you are in class X. With your antisocial behavior, you are not part of society. Therefore, you have no right to housing. I remind you that failure to change your behavior will result in a stay in the reformatory. Please leave this building immediately.
texts.day06_cost_coverage_answer: I have taken up their request. It will take a few days for the application to be fully reviewed. You will be notified of progress.
texts.be_patient: Your application is under consideration. Please be patient a little longer.
